title: Drawing, "Design for inkstand", 1800–25
medium: Brush and yellow, red, black and brown watercolor, black wash, graphite, on cream laid paper
inscribed:
Below center, in brown ink: No. 66179; in graphite: 108
Upper left, in graphite: LeFebure
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Rectangular box on cushion feet, drawer in open position, at right. Front panel decorated with swans, scrolling leaves and masks. Top of box shows a center urn flanked by half-cupids, covered cups at either end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for inkstand", 1800–25.
1800–25. Brush and yellow, red, black and brown watercolor, black wash, graphite, on cream laid paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-154.
